Simulating from a synthesized object

Source: R/sim.synth.R
simsynth.Rd

Simulating from a synthesized object

Usage

simsynth(object, n = 200, drop.latent = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

object

generated with synthesize

n

sample size

drop.latent

if TRUE remove the latent event times from the resulting data set.

...

additional arguments passed on to lava::sim

Examples

library(survival)
m=synthesize(Surv(time,status)~sex+age+bili,data=pbc)
simsynth(m,10,drop.latent=TRUE)
#>    sex      age      bili      time status
#> 1    m 41.47054 -4.526998 3267.7279      0
#> 2    f 43.12007  4.560565  745.3906      2
#> 3    f 33.83087  5.034037 2160.9783      0
#> 4    f 41.29411  4.781646  740.7289      1
#> 5    f 60.13917 -1.902381 1315.4561      0
#> 6    f 32.08955  7.310436  828.0181      2
#> 7    f 43.71165 -1.842286 1052.7630      2
#> 8    f 53.37745  3.264982 2544.7649      2
#> 9    f 68.54467 13.653998  683.4568      2
#> 10   f 54.12396  4.649423 2591.6119      0
